title: Pagoda: A Web Development Starter Kit for Go Programmers
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Mike Stefanello found the JS framework world to be chaotic. Needing a quick way to start web development projects in Go, he created Pagoda.
cntitle: Pagoda：Go 程序员的 Web 开发入门套件
cndescription: Mike Stefanello 发现 JS 框架领域非常混乱。由于需要一种在 Go 中快速启动 Web 开发项目的方法，他创建了 Pagoda。
